job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming
job_details.full_text:
Implementation Engineer, Jigsaw (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

Are you a software consultant who has relied on LLMs to make life easier for most of your career? Are you afraid your hard skills will atrophy if you continue spending most of your day on low-skill tasks? Jigsaw is revolutionizing consulting by harnessing the power of AI to cut through the noise and let you focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients. If you're driven by innovation and want to be at the forefront of AI-enhanced project delivery, this role is tailor-made for you.

   Jigsaw is fundamentally rethinking how projects are delivered, using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic. Say goodbye to the grind of manual configuration, which you are overqualified to do anyway, and hello to a world where AI does the heavy lifting, freeing you to focus on building systems and delivering unparalleled client service.

   This isn't your average consulting gig. If you're looking to spend your days entrenched in manual tasks, this isn't the job for you. Instead, we need someone who thrives on using AI to push boundaries, someone who relishes the challenge of aligning technology with client business goals. You'll be advising on everything from survey design to panel creation, all while ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations.

   Join us if you're excited by the idea of transforming the consulting landscape, if you want to leave behind the old ways and embrace a role where your strategic input has real, measurable impact. This is your chance to be part of a team that's not just keeping up with the future of consulting but defining it. If that sounds like you, we want to hear from you.

   What you will be doing

     * AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
     * Consulting Services: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements, advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation, and training clients on the software platform.
     * Configuration Services: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.

   What you will NOT be doing

     * Manually reviewing every knowledge base article and Excel trackers
     * Creating slide decks
     * Traveling to client sites
     * Coding or programming

job_profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on the application of AI tools to enhance productivity in consulting rather than the development or deep technical implementation of AI models. While generative AI is mentioned, the core tasks involve using it as a tool for project delivery and client service, not building or fine-tuning AI systems.

phrases.phrase: focus on what truly matters: delivering high-impact results for clients
phrases.justification: This phrase highlights the importance of understanding client needs and delivering valuable outcomes, which is a core aspect of business understanding.

phrases.phrase: aligning technology with client business goals
phrases.justification: Directly states the need to connect technical solutions with business objectives, a key component of business understanding.

phrases.phrase: Gathering and analyzing customer business requirements
phrases.justification: This task explicitly involves understanding and documenting the business needs of clients.

phrases.phrase: advising on survey structure, best practices for panel creation
phrases.justification: This involves understanding the client's business context and providing expert advice based on best practices, demonstrating business acumen.

phrases.phrase: ensuring that the solutions you deliver are flawlessly aligned with client expectations
phrases.justification: Emphasizes the need to meet client needs and expectations, which requires a deep understanding of their business.

phrases.phrase: harnessing the power of AI
phrases.justification: Indicates the use of AI technologies, which can encompass modeling, though not explicitly building models.

phrases.phrase: using generative AI to automate the mundane and elevate the strategic
phrases.justification: Mentions generative AI, suggesting its application, but the focus is on automation and elevation rather than model creation.

phrases.phrase: AI-Enhanced Project Delivery: Using generative AI to improve project delivery, customer communications, and validation of project deliverables.
phrases.justification: This phrase indicates the application of generative AI for specific project outcomes, implying some level of interaction with or utilization of AI models.

phrases.phrase: building systems
phrases.justification: Suggests involvement in the creation of systems, which can include software development, although the context is broad.

phrases.phrase: training clients on the software platform
phrases.justification: Implies interaction with and understanding of a software platform, which could involve aspects of software development or its application.

phrases.phrase: Configuring surveys, panels, and data gathering processes within the software platform.
phrases.justification: This involves working within a software platform to set up specific functionalities, which is related to applying software capabilities.

phrases.phrase: AI-Enhanced Project Delivery
phrases.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, improving project delivery using AI can involve operational aspects of deploying and managing AI-driven processes.
